price: 88 Mangez des nourritures pures et saines qu’Allah vous a dispensées. Et craignez Allah en qui vous croyez.
arabic: وَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنتُم بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī antum bihi mu'minūna
